list.name: Changes
list.comment: Refactor CORS configuration and improve code readability

task.summary:
Add media handling and content filtering features
- Introduced MediaItem interface for better media management in posts. - Enhanced Post interface to include mediaItems array. - Implemented HTML stripping and media extraction utilities. - Added content filtering logic to exclude NSFW and non-English posts. - Updated post fetching logic to support new media handling and filtering. - Created MediaViewer and MediaGrid components for displaying media content. - Added styles for media components and loading indicators. - Updated HomePage to display sample posts with new structure.
Refactor CORS configuration and improve code readability

MESSAGE.value:
Add media handling and content filtering features
- Introduced MediaItem interface for better media management in posts. - Enhanced Post interface to include mediaItems array. - Implemented HTML stripping and media extraction utilities. - Added content filtering logic to exclude NSFW and non-English posts. - Updated post fetching logic to support new media handling and filtering. - Created MediaViewer and MediaGrid components for displaying media content. - Added styles for media components and loading indicators. - Updated HomePage to display sample posts with new structure.
Refactor CORS configuration and improve code readability

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Refactor CORS configuration and improve code readability
